title: Ex. Virginia Governor's Conviction Could Serve As Warning To Politicians
teaser: David Nather of Politico discusses the lessons and implications of the trial of Bob McDonnell and his wife Maureen.
contentencoded:
Former Virginia Governor Bob McDonnell was found guilty yesterday of 11 public corruption charges. His wife, Maureen, was also convicted of a number of similar charges.

David Nather, a senior policy reporter for Politico, joins Here & Now’s Meghna Chakrabarti to discuss the lessons and implications of the trial.

  • Read David Nather’s piece, “The McDonnell verdict’s lesson: Politicians beware”

Guest

  • David Nather, senior policy reporter at Politico. He tweets @DavidNather.
